resources.string: The developer of the app is Bidipto Roy , a student of Jadavpur University . I live in Kolkata .I love to eat , I am a great foodie , so making this app was real fun
Who is the developer of this app ?

My interests include a lot of amazing stuffs . I like to make projects like these , I am learning android development and I want to learn more and build more projects . Apart from that I don\'t mind practising coding , I code normally in Java . I have also tried learning Data Science , learned R ,data-visualization .
What technologies are used to make this app ?

This app is made using Kotlin . I have used libraries Volley ,Picasso ; used Room wrapper for storing data . I have used Relative , Linear ,Constraint layouts mainly for the UI .The app is made using fragments and activity to better user experience .

I have my own youtube channel with the name "Bidipto Roy".I make videos for college students , so If you are reading this you can subscribe to my channel , I will upload some cool stuffs . I have also started writing blogs on mind set of people , its fun ! I also like to edit photos and videos .I love to eat .I am a huge cricket fan . I also like watching meaningful movies and I have started reading some books and I would love to build that habit in me to read .
In this period of lock down I have changed a lot . Now I want to explore new domains , try out new things , take risks and give my best in what ever I am doing .
